long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A companion chrome extension for Corix AI. Add any website to your knowledge base on Corix AI. Save articles and converse with Corix about it at any time in the future. Manage sites saved from your Corix dashboard.
